bibl.title: A Statuette of Isis and Harpocrates in the Kelsey Museum.
bibl.note: Kelsey Museum, Inv. 4674 (gift of H.C. Hoskier). Statuette of Isis and Harpocrates. Bronze with gold gilding (h. 9.9 cm). Early 3rd century B.C. - late 1st century B.C.
bibl.seg: Rubin Benjamin, A Statuette of Isis and Harpocrates in the Kelsey Museum.
Kelsey Museum, Inv. 4674 (gift of H.C. Hoskier). Statuette of Isis and Harpocrates. Bronze with gold gilding (h. 9.9 cm). Early 3rd century B.C. - late 1st century B.C.
